text: 'My preferred pizza spot in Hoboken. Would recommend the Margherita or Pepperoni slice and the Chicken Tenders. Food is delicious and cooked to perfection. Nice spot on Washington Street where you can eat indoors or outdoors.'

text: 'This spot is worth visiting. They serve big portions for affordable prices. Regularly well kept and with good ambience. Will visit here again.'

text: "I went there in November and was interested in Linguine Amore which is $17.45

text: 'The penne vodka at this place is a godsend. I mean it. I visit my boyfriend in Hoboken around every 3 weeks or so and I start looking forward to it way in advance. It is exactly what penne vodka is supposed to be and they are very generous ‚Ä¶'

text: "This place is great

text: "Came in for a quick slice and there was no line! Staff was extremely friendly and great to chat with. Got my pizza quick and was out the door in no time. Best tasting pizza I've had in a long time. Had just about the right crunchiness and softness in the crust. The sauce and cheese were perfect

text: 'There is definitely a dearth of great pizza in Hoboken

author: Harry Freedman
text: "Having lived my entire life (18 years) in Hoboken
column5: I can easily proclaim Giovanni's as the champion dining establishment for a slice of pizza. There is a lot of contention on this subject in an area with so much pride in their pizza but Giovanni's will give you the tastiest
column6: best quality pizza for your money."

text: 'Great pizza!  will definately be back!'
